Game - Class in Server.game
Represents a game between two players.
Game(Player, Player, MapConfigfuration) - Constructor for class Server.game.Game
Initializes the game with two players and a map configuration.
GameEndDto - Class in DTOs
Data transfer object representing the end of a game.

Constructs a new GameEndDto.
